mapper.select: SELECT ec.id as courseId, ec.title AS courseName, ec.price, ec.lesson_num AS courseNum, ec.cover, et.name AS teacherName, es1.title AS parentSubject, es2.title AS childSubject FROM edu_teacher et JOIN edu_course ec ON et.id = ec.teacher_id JOIN edu_subject es1 ON ec.parent_subject_id = es1.id JOIN edu_subject es2 ON ec.child_subject_id = es2.id WHERE ec.id = #{courseId}
